caseTitle: Ghazanfar Ali v. Appellate Authority/Additional District Judge, Sahiwal & others
tagline: The qualifications and disqualifications imposed by section 27 of the Punjab Local Government Act 2013 for a candidate to contest the election and even to hold office should be construed and applied strictly, and a person can only be debarred from contesting elections or holding an office if the case falls squarely within the strict scope of the qualifications and disqualifications stipulated by law.
